name: One Plus 12 pro
description: The OnePlus 12 Pro packs a 6.7-inch Fluid AMOLED display that comes with 16 million colour reproductions. The display comes with a resolution of 3200 x 1440 pixels and brings a 524ppi pixel density. For performance, the OnePlus 12 Pro is powered by the latest Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor.
